title: clarify $NODE in run_fastx_barcode_splitter.sh
body: $NODE should refer to queue. It is better to clarify it.

title: Need to trim another adapter?
body: I checked the plots FASTQC produced with the trimmed data, and found there are still adapters in some sequence. I searched the reverse adapter sequence "AGATCGGAAGAGCGGGGACTTTAAGC" and found there are some in the fastq.gz files. Could you please add this adapter to the "run_quality_control.sh"?

title: Could you add a step to check if reference genome index?
body: In "run_read_mapping.sh", could you add a step to check if reference genome index? If not, add index reference genome.
